title: If This Studio Could Talk (Advanced Media at Arizona State University)
content:
Hello,  
 [If This Studio Could Talk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/vimeo.com/9666944) was created by students in [Advanced Media](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s), a course in the [School of Design Innovation](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/design.asu.edu/sdi/) at [Arizona State University](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/www.asu.edu/). For more context on this work-in-progress, [see other videos from this class](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/typophile.com/node/68269) or [read the official project description on the course syllabus](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/tannerwoodford.com/syllabus/2010s/1.html). The video was produced by Alison Conley, Cody Evol, Melissa Gillard, Kyle Larkin, Giada Mannino, Jilanne Petticrew, Gina Santangelo and Hoang Ton.

[http://vimeo.com/9666944](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/vimeo.com/9666944)

[If This Studio Could Talk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/vimeo.com/9666944) from [Alison Conley](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/vimeo.com/user2223817) on [Vimeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317183412/http:/vimeo.com/).

We look forward your feedback.  
Thank you.
author: tannerwoodford
